text: The sun is a star that provides light and heat to our planet. It is the center of our solar system, and all the planets orbit around it. The sun's energy helps plants grow and gives warmth to living beings. Without the sun, life on Earth would not exist. It rises in the east and sets in the west, creating day and night.

text: Anna loves reading books. Every afternoon, she sits under a big oak tree in her backyard and reads her favorite stories. She enjoys adventure books the most because they take her to different worlds. One day, she found an old book in the library with a golden cover. It was full of magical tales. Anna spent hours reading and imagining the wonderful places described in the book.
